Contributor Corner Senior Consultant Club Staying Consistent What's Next

Congratulations on reaching the Senior Consultant level!

You’ve invested in your business, your team – in short, you’ve invested in yourself to reach new heights with Pure Romance!

Being a Senior Consultant means you’re now a growing leader with Pure Romance. You have a team of women you can support, mentor, and help develop into leaders. You’re in it together!

This also means you get some pretty cool perks, like:

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3

Enjoy a Higher Buying Discount: bye-bye, 40% or 45%; you’re now buying at a 50% Discount (this means more money in your pocket!)

Your Monthly Lifestyle Bonus: enjoy an extra $100 a month just for meeting (and continuing to meet) the Senior Consultant requirements!

Cha-ching! You Get Larger Overrides: you’ll now earn 2.5% on your 1st downline and 2.5% on your 2nd downline – keep growing your team to see these overrides grow!

You’re proof that hard work, passion, and dedication do pay off – so we’re going to reward you for that. The rewards keep growing the higher you advance, so while you celebrate your promotion to Senior Consultant, set your eye on the next prize and keep hustling!
